comparison.description: How to compare the stored result of the specified command to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How to compare the stored result of the specified command to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the stored result of the specified command to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the stored result of the specified command to.

type.description: [Block Condition Type](../block_condition_types.md) Compares the result of the specified command to the specified value at the position of the block. Type ID: `origins:command` !!! caution This block condition type only operates on the server-side, meaning that it cannot be used in fields that are evaluated on the client-side.
type.markdownDescription: [Block Condition Type](../block_condition_types.md) Compares the result of the specified command to the specified value at the position of the block. Type ID: `origins:command` !!! caution This block condition type only operates on the server-side, meaning that it cannot be used in fields that are evaluated on the client-side.
